quotes.quote: The probability of you remaining yourself until the day you die is extremely low. The hopeless spark you have now will be corrupted and in the most awful way there is.
Remember this. The only words that can keep you alive are "I want to live."
Violence, greed, slaughter, corruption, defeat, failure, immorality, humiliationâ€¦ These are everywhere. As long as you live, you will face them.

On a Monday, God created the world. 
On Tuesday, God drew the line between Order and Chaos. 
On Wednesday, God arranged each and every number. 
On Thursday, God permitted the ebb and flow of Time. 
On Friday, God explored every nook and cranny of the world. 

On Saturday, God rested. 
And on Sunday, God... 
forsook the world.
Schools are facilities where human society secludes the troublesome children by age criteria.
We simply cannot see the world as it is. The world people see is nothing more than how our brains translate it. In other words, it's subjective.

Wishes shouldn't be granted. They're better off not coming true. When their wishes aren't granted, people actually put in effort. It's because they don't come true that people make progress. But if all their wishes come true, people won't be able to move forward anymore, you know?

I do want to die. But I want to die happily. Like I have for others, I want someone to wave me off. My friends, my wife, and my children... Making them mourn for me, making them long for me, and leaving things that I should have done behind... That is how I want to die.
